The femme sat down and  looked Rodimus, she was very worried for=

hoogroups.com

Fallen Legend



  ::Jhiaxus-Hevn::

  Hevn: On my way, Nightlight.

  Hevn=
 triangulates the signal and transforms to beast mode. He takes off for the=
 island.

  Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:
    Hydras/Nightlight:=


    Hydras wonder what was happening that Jhiaxus was so happy.


    ***=
***************************************************************************=


    Nightlight:

    "Follow my signal"said the femme "We are some where =
close of the base"

Allen

      ::Jhiaxus-Hevn::

 =
     Back at the Pred base Jhiaxus cracked a smile apon hearing that Rodimu=
s Prime was wounded. The smile transfered to the Hevn puppet but no one was=
 around to notice or care.

      Hevn: Where are you currently? I'll come =
as quik as possible.

      Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:
      =
  Nighlight:

        "We need your help, Kup and another friend is here...=
 Rodimus" her voice templed"is seriously wounded... please come quickly... =
we need your help "

h Hevn's commlink. He responds through the puppet.

you, Nightlight. Go ahead.

 wrote:

            "Then we should call him"said N=
ighlight, she opened the com link and 
            said "Hevn, do you copy?=
